name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is the base tool of every front-end developer as it provides user-interaction capabilities and dynamic data manipulation to create great user experience and to build powerful web apps.

name: AngularJS
description: A framework of such power it can make ground shake, AngularJS is one of the best tools for building single-page web apps, as well as my most favorite framework. It's also one of the most popular JS platforms of all time.

name: Java
description: An object-orianteted, class-based language that can run on any platform which supports JVM. Java gives a lot of opportunities to build awesome cross-platform apps and is my dearest language for building desktop applications and web services.

name: CSS
description: CSS is one of the base tools, along with HTML and JS, for any web developer used to create visually engaging websites. CSS is for web developers and designers what a stone was for David (vs Goliath).

name: Responsive Design
description: In the information era, building responsive websites isn't an option anymore it's a necessity. I always write my apps responsive on a wide range of devices for greater user experience (phone, tablet and pc).
